org.apache.arrow.flight.integration.tests

Class FlightSqlScenarioProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.flight.integration.tests.FlightSqlScenarioProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, FlightProducer, FlightSqlProducer

    public class FlightSqlScenarioProducer
extends Object
implements FlightSqlProducer
    Hardcoded Flight SQL producer used for cross-language integration tests.
